response_requirements.initial_response_description: Agencies must determine within 5 business days whether to comply. Written notification required within the 5-day period. Excludes Saturdays, Sundays, and legal holidays.
response_requirements.no_response_consequence: Request review by Kentucky Attorney General within 30 days or file directly in Circuit Court

fee_structure.standard_copy_fee: Actual reproduction costs only for non-commercial use
fee_structure.search_time_fee: No search or staff time fees for non-commercial use. Can charge for staff time for commercial use.
fee_structure.notes: Non-commercial users pay only reproduction costs, no search fees. Commercial users face higher fee structure including staff time and acquisition costs. Cannot charge sales tax on copies. May require advance payment.

exemptions.description: Personal records where disclosure would constitute clearly unwarranted invasion of personal privacy
Records of law enforcement agencies compiled in detecting/investigating violations (with timing restrictions)
Preliminary drafts, notes, correspondence, and memoranda
Confidential research records of institutions of higher education
Records of agencies handling public funds' investments

appeal_process.appeal_authority: Kentucky Attorney General or Circuit Court
appeal_process.appeal_description: Request review by Attorney General within 30 days (AG has 20 days to issue decision) OR file original action directly in Circuit Court. 30-day deadline to appeal AG decision is STRICT.
appeal_process.burden_of_proof: Public agency bears burden of proof

penalties.civil: Attorney fees may be available. AG decisions have force and effect of law if not appealed within 30 days.

requester_requirements.specific_format: Must be Kentucky resident (includes individuals, domestic businesses, out-of-state businesses registered with SOS, workers in KY, property owners, news organizations). Non-residents can request but cannot enforce through appeal.
requester_requirements.notes: Only Kentucky residents have enforceable rights under the Act. Resident definition is broad and includes news-gathering organizations.

response_format_options: Redacted copies if records contain exempt and non-exempt information
specific_obligations: Must provide written decision within 5 business days
Make suitable facilities available for inspection
Provide redacted copies if records contain both exempt and non-exempt information

oversight_body.name: Kentucky Attorney General's Office
oversight_body.role: Primary enforcement mechanism. Issues binding decisions unless appealed. Maintains online database of precedential decisions.
oversight_body.contact_info: 700 Capitol Avenue, Suite 118, Frankfort, KY 40601. Website: ag.ky.gov
enforcement_powers: Issue binding decisions (unless appealed within 30 days)

primary_sources: Kentucky Attorney General open records decisions
validation_metadata.verification_notes: Parsed from official statutory text file. Response time verified against canonical-values.json (5 business days). 10 of 14 exemptions parsed from statute. Strict construction of exemptions required.
